data.text: @bt_uk Well I have been trying to get help from BT for weeks.  On the Isle of Iona, my house has intermittent phone line and no WiFi.  You keep telling me there is a problem outside my house but no engineer has come to fix it.

Hey @bt_uk youve changed me over to bt digital voice making my phone unusable, I have replied ‚ÄòNOT RECEIVED‚Äô as requested to about 20 text messages. Having to wait until next week for the delivery of some stupid box without any phone service is no joke when stuck at home ( 1/2 )
@bt_uk This only gives a phone number. No thank you. I have too much to do. I can give area details via DM
@bt_uk Hi we updated our contracts with you TV/ broadband in January this year. Just seen you have a better tv box. Is it possible to get upgraded to one?

@bt_uk Trying to report telephone cables which have been cut to properties in an block of flats. I am not a customer of BT Upto 20 properties affected, can not speak with anyone due to automated service.

@bt_uk why are you sending out a new router when all I'm doing is moving home and the router I have is the latest router. Is this why you charge people when they move? Another router is so unnecessary and wasteful

@Experian_UK @bt_uk @Equifax You have disputed this 3 times and nothing changes. @bt_uk say I‚Äôm not allowed to speak to their team who handle this either. Shocking as this is data about me! I think a chat with the @financialombuds is needed.

@bt_uk 2/2 emergency hub. Said hub did turn up. But there was no follow-up from BT. Nobody contacted me to let me know what would happen next time - is there an easy way of letting BT know to re-activate the hub or what?

@bt_uk So, if someone could tell me to whom I should complain about what I regard as a negative change about which I could do absolutely nothing, that would be great.

@bt_uk @bt_uk more lie from the operatives at @bt_uk. No call back‚Ä¶. Lie after lie after lie! What a joke of a company. You guys don‚Äôt know if you are coming or going. Utterly appalling.

tweets.text: It's the middle of the week, and we're in the middle of helping our customers! We're only a tweet away, get in touch.
@life_art_mimi Thanks for getting in touch, you can report this online. Have a look at this page for more info and click on the contact form link https://t.co/uH2tYWvJRt ^StephK

@bt_uk You could try, but historically you always disappoint so probably not.

@lisahlisalisa If this is an outage in the area then this would be on the openreach network and we would be providing you with the timescales they have gave us to fix it.

Its likely that all service providers who use the openreach network will also be affected by this and not just BT. ^Paul
